DEBUG_OPTIONS.desc: Debug options for ACRN hypervisor, only valid on debug version

RELEASE.desc: Release build. 'y' for Release, 'n' for Debug.

SERIAL_CONSOLE.desc: The serial device which is used for hypervisor debug, only valid on Debug version.

NPK_LOGLEVEL.desc: Default loglevel for the hypervisor NPK log

CONSOLE_LOGLEVEL.desc: Default loglevel on the serial console

LOG_DESTINATION.desc: Bitmap of consoles where logs are printed.

LOG_BUF_SIZE.desc: Capacity of logbuf for each physical cpu.

SCHEDULER.desc: The CPU scheduler to be used by the hypervisor.

MULTIBOOT2.desc: Support boot ACRN from multiboot2 protocol.

CDP_ENABLED.desc: CDP (Code and Data Prioritization). CDP is an extension of CAT.

IOMMU_ENFORCE_SNP.desc: IOMMU enforce snoop behavior of DMA operation.

L1D_VMENTRY_ENABLED.desc: Enable L1 cache flush before VM entry.

MCE_ON_PSC_DISABLED.desc: Force to disable software workaround for Machine Check Error on Page Size Change.

STACK_SIZE.desc: Capacity of one stack, in bytes.

HV_RAM_SIZE.desc: Size of the RAM region used by the hypervisor

HV_RAM_START.desc: 2M-aligned Start physical address of the RAM region used by the hypervisor.

LOW_RAM_SIZE.desc: Size of the low RAM region

UOS_RAM_SIZE.desc: Size of the User OS (UOS) RAM.

SOS_RAM_SIZE.desc: Size of the Service OS (SOS) RAM.

PLATFORM_RAM_SIZE.desc: Size of the physical platform RAM

CAPACITIES.desc: Capacity limits for static assigned data struct or maximum supported resouce

IOMMU_BUS_NUM.desc: Highest PCI bus ID used during IOMMU initialization.

MAX_IR_ENTRIES.desc: Maximum number of Interrupt Remapping Entries.

MAX_IOAPIC_LINES.desc: Maximum number of interrupt lines per IOAPIC.

MAX_PT_IRQ_ENTRIES.desc: Maximum number of interrupt source for PT devices.

MAX_MSIX_TABLE_NUM.desc: Maximum number of MSI-X tables per device. Please leave it blank if not sure.

MAX_EMULATED_MMIO.desc: Maximum number of emulated MMIO regions.

GPU_SBDF.desc: Segment, Bus, Device, and function of the GPU.
